course_description: Application of basic ecological concepts to the design of architectural structures. In addition, the course will explore the concept of 'biophilia'(inherent love of nature) and 'biomimicry'(using nature to inform design) in architectural design.
schedule_location: MW 10am-11:15am in New Psyc Bldg 250 (36 Eagle Ro
sections: Class Nbr: 3636, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: J. Wegner, Status: Open
